title: Minecraft 1.7.9 发布
author: junyi5353
txt_content:
本帖最后由 junyi5353 于 2014-5-3 12:53 编辑 
正式版是Minecraft经过一段时间的预览版测试之后得到的稳定版本，也是众多材质、MOD与CraftBukkit插件会逐渐跟进的版本。官方正版登陆器也会第一时间进行推送。
建议玩家与开服的朋友关注其相关MOD及其所需的API、CraftBukkit与其插件的更新，迎接新的正式版吧！
专注于单人游戏的玩家可立即更新，多人玩家请关注您所在的服务器的通知。请勿将版本号中不加任何前缀的1.7.X与一年多前的Minecraft Beta 1.7混淆。注意！旧版启动器已经无法启动1.6及以后版本。请所有用户（无论是否正版）更新您的启动器。详见下文说明。本版新闻除非特别说明，否则均允许转载，但转载必须注明本帖地址。
此前与本次更新相关的快讯列表：Dinnerbone：关于1.7.9
非常重要的信息：
请注意：第一次启动1.7.9服务器时，请一定保证你的服务器运行模式正确（在线/离线模式）！在线模式的名单格式和离线模式的名单格式不兼容。所以请服主不要随意更改在线/离线模式。服务器应该会以新的格式自动更新玩家的资料，即为自动转换op.txt\whitelist.txt为新格式并附上自动生成的UUID，老文件会被修改扩展名，但您仍可以通过记事本打开，所作修改不会保存在服务器配置中。

Mojang官方提示：
Please make sure that you are in the correct server mode (online mode/offline mode) when you start the 1.7.9 server for the first time, because profiles are not compatible between these two server modes.


中文更新内容:
1.7.9在1.7.8的基础上修复了有关皮肤和服务器的重要bug，更新了更改名字的速度，暗示即将支持更改名字
1.7.9仍只是一个对皮肤和服务器进行修复的版本，有关更新内容请参照下文1.7.6更新内容和英文原文更新内容
Update: We have released version 1.7.9 with an important bugfix to fix some server crashes, and to resolve some skin related issues (including more crashes)
Version 1.7.9 is now officially released. This version contains some bugfixes, a few updates to make Realms even better than it already is and prepares Minecraft for the renaming feature that will eventually allow you to rename your player. The renaming feature will not be available right now, but this is an important step towards it. We have also changed the internal handling of player skins to make use of our new, improved skin servers.

有关1.7.6更新内容

使Realms（领域）更好玩！（不要想了，天朝一定没份！）准备开启Minecraft的重命名功能，能允许正版玩家更名（也就是说此版本暂时无法使用）使用新皮肤格式


详细特性请参阅Minecraft 1.7（改变世界的更新）特性列表

正版启动器下载地址：Windows: https://s3.amazonaws.com/Minecraft.Download/launcher/Minecraft.exeMac/OSX: https://s3.amazonaws.com/Minecraft.Download/launcher/Minecraft.dmgLinux/其它: https://s3.amazonaws.com/Minecraft.Download/launcher/Minecraft.jar

纯净客户端&官方服务端论坛内下载地址
http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-264445-1-1.html（已更新1.7.9）
正版/非正版启动方式说明：对于正版用户：
新官方启动器虽然已经进入正式版，但功能还在不断完善中、还处于开发初期，建议每次新快照出现都重新下载一遍启动器。启动器在上文已经提供。适用于全PC平台。如有仍疑惑请到原版问答板块提问。

对于非正版用户：可以到推荐启动器列表寻找合适的启动器。如有仍疑惑请到原版问答板块提问。
关注最新版本资讯，请关注MCBBS新闻版Minecraft官方版本信息索引（自正式版1.0.0至今）与版规




外部来源以及详细的更新条目追踪： 
Mojang官方博客（英文）Jeb的Twitter（英文，大陆朋友需翻墙）Minecraft官方论坛（英文）Minecraft英文WIKI：Version History页面（英文，更新条目详细，还算比较及时）Minecraft中文WIKI：版本记录页面（中文，更新条目详细，但会有一定滞后）

replies.author: lz你好啊
replies.txt_content:
准备发洗个澡后又被抢了QAQ
lready is and prepares Minecraft for the renaming feature that will eventually allow you to rename your player. The renaming feature will not be available right now, but this is an important step towards it. We have also changed the internal handling of player skins to make use of our new, improved skin servers.

Unfortunately the 1.7.6 and newer versions are not compatible with 1.7.5 (or earlier) servers. Please update your servers to 1.7.9, this is also an important step to prepare them for the upcoming 1.8 release. Servers should automatically update all player profiles to the new format, but please make sure that you are in the correct server mode (online mode/offline mode) when you start the 1.7.9 server for the first time, because profiles are not compatible between these two server modes.

Because this is important, let me repeat that last sentence:
Please make sure that you are in the correct server mode (online mode/offline mode) when you start the 1.7.9 server for the first time, because profiles are not compatible between these two server modes.

You can find more information about the 1.7.9 update in the frequently asked questions section of our previous post.

Cross-platform server jar: https://s3.amazonaws.com/Minecra ... ft_server.1.7.9.jar

Report bugs here:

麻将原文
